title: ‘There’s an Arms Race’: Inside the Chase for the Peloton’s Next Mega-Carbohydrate Superfuel
content:
Elite racing is fuelled by more carbs than ever before, and team nutrition partners are in their own race to keep up.

Read the full article at ‘There’s an Arms Race’: Inside the Chase for the Peloton’s Next Mega-Carbohydrate Superfuel on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
